title: Fast Fashion's ‘Recycled’ Clothing Waste
itunes:title: Fast Fashion's ‘Recycled’ Clothing Waste
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Vancouver Bureau Chief Natalie Obiko Pearson share the details of Natalie's Businessweek Magazine story Fast Fashion’s Recycling Myth Buries Developing World in Waste. Bloomberg Businessweek Media, Entertainment and Telecom Editor Felix Gillette and New York Times Television Reporter John Koblin discuss their book It's Not TV: The Spectacular Rise, Revolution, and Future of HBO. And we Drive to the Close with Carol Schleif, Chief Investment Officer at BMO Family Office.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
